full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN DAM PA 'JAM DBYANGS SPRUL PA'I SKU LA GSOL 'DEBS KYI BRTAN BZHUGS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B (CES RJE BTZUN DAM PA 'JAM DBYANGS SPRUL PA'I SKU LA GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS DANG BCAS PA 'DI NI, KUN DGA' BKRA SHIS KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR CHOS SMRA BA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG YE SHES KYIS GZIMS KHANG RGYAL MTSAN MTHON PO NYI MA'I 'OD DKYIL BAR SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,@003A *, ,SVA STI, NGO MTSAR MTSAN DPE'I GZI 'BAR 'KHOR LO SDOM, ,GDUL BYA'I DON DU NGUR SMRIG RNAM ROL GYIS, ,BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN PHYOGS BCUR RGYAS MDZAD PA'I, ,RJE BTZUN BLA MA YUN RING ZHABS BRTAN SHOG ,PHAN BDE 'BYUNG GNAS 'DAM DPAL SNYING PO YI, ,BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTAN 'DZIN PA'I MCHOG ,BYANG PHYOGS 'GRO BA'I BSOD NAMS NYER 'TSO RU, ,GA-YO MED RDO RJE LTA BUR BRTAN PAR SHOG ,SKU GSUM MNGON GYUR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS DANG, ,CHOS DANG 'PHAGS TSOGS THUGS RJE'I BDEN BYIN GYIS, ,BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GSAL MDZAD PA'I, ,RJE BTZUN BLA MA SRID MTHAR ZHABS BRTAN SHOG ,CES PA 'DI NI DBU MDZAD RIN CHEN RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, ,RJE BTZUN DAM PA 'JAM DBYANGS SPRUL PA'I SKU LA BRTAN BZHUGS KYI TSOGS BCAD CIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG YE SHES KYIS BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'U GZUMS KHANG RGYAL MTSAN MTHON POR SMRAS PA'O,, ,,   )
